verses.roman:
tabe svarūpa kaila nitāira caraṇa vandana
nityānanda-prabhu kaila prema-āliṅgana

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; svarūpa—Svarūpa Dāmodara; kaila—did; nitāira—of Nityānanda Prabhu; caraṇa—of the lotus feet; vandana—worship; nityānanda-prabhu—Lord Nityānanda; kaila—did; prema-āliṅgana—embracing in love.
translation: Svarūpa Dāmodara then worshiped the lotus feet of Nityānanda Prabhu, and Nityānanda in turn embraced him in the ecstasy of love.
